data.title: Why Facebook Stock Is Set for Success Heading Into a Downturn
data.text:
Facebook continues to prove it's ready to make big moves while competitors struggle to keep the lights on, meaning good things for FB stock.
The post Why Facebook Stock Is Set for Success Heading Into a Downturn appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Will FAANG Stocks Steal the Show This Earnings Season As Well?
data.text: FAANG's huge market value determines the movement of the stock market, and thus any upsetting quarterly release will have far-reaching consequences.

data.title: Facebook Is Making a $5.7 Billion Bet on India
data.text: That's more than the social networking juggernaut spent on Oculus and Instagram combined.

data.title: Virus precautions by Facebook Marketplace in the UK are falling short of its rivals
data.text: Facebook Marketplace is one of the biggest second-hand buying and selling platforms in the world.
